title: So why is tank ekko still a thing?
body: Hmm maybe your tank items are too op riot? maybe you should remove some dmg from tank items riot?

replies.body:
Ekko will always be better as a tank or bruiser. His ultimate and sustained damage sticking play pattern dictate that.

They need to either embrace that he's going to a bruiser with an assassin play pattern as an option or rework him. 

That said this iteration of Ekko seems strong but not ridiculous like sunfire/iceborn was at its height. Tank items are actually in a good spot. Not too strong but not too weak either
Tank seems to work on nearly everyone atm
